Detailed Description

This packet is used to send information about a possible error in the map to the info-module.

This is a quite informal description that is inserted into the database. The information is not used until it is post-processed and inserted to the maps by a human.

The packet contans a MapUpdateDBaseObject after the standard RequestPacket-header.

See also:
MapUpdateDBaseObject
